reviewText:
Great movies , Great deal .Very enjoyable ,would buy again.
Thank You very much.
James Martell
Ordered them for our church library.  Very inspirational.  Both are originally made in Italian, but they have an English dubbed track if you don't want to read the captions.
Great price for two excellent movies. Fast shipping.
the real story of the life of saint rita and the life of padre pio life very interesting videos

THE STORY, DIRECTION, AND SUPORTING CAST, ALONG WITH THE CINEMATOGTRAPHY WAS EXCELLENT, HOWEVER, I FOUND THE ACTRESS PLAYING SAINT RITA WAS SOMEWHAT DITACHED. SHE NEEDED TO DEVELOP THE DEPTH OF FEELING FOR THIS PART. THE KNIGHT WHO PLAYED HER HUSBAND WAS EXCELLENT, AND HAD A FULL RANGE OF EMOTIONAL DEPTH..  THE FILM WAS A TOO LONG.PROBABLY BECAUSE AFTER THE KNIGHT DIED, SHE WAS THE CENTER OF ATTRACTION, AND IT JUST DID NOT WORK FOR ME.  I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS FILM HOWEVER, BECAUSE THEIR ARE SO MANY FINE ACTORS IN THIS MOVIE..

I really enjoy the movie and I'm looking forward to watched it again with my family, even though is a little violent but real. I love it shows how we all can be saints, by working hard putting God first and living according to it. Not easy, but possible. It's a must see!
The story is very inspiring to be a follower of the Lord and to be dedicated to serve the poor.
